public class ModeNormal
extends ModeJeu
Inherited the game mode class. Is the specific process of normal mode.

Fulin and Dewen

    • play

      public void play​(int i, MouseCliquer mouseCliquer)
      Play a card for the button "Play". When the player presses the button "Play", the class MouseCliquer will call this method. Only physical players can press the button
      Specified by:
      play in class ModeJeu
      Parameters:
      i - : The number of the player, starting from 0.
      mouseCliquer - : The mouse object.
